title: Nicole IS Jay Leno
description:
H-E-L-L-O! This week, Nicole and Sasheer discuss good times at the airport, British cops having fun hats, Nicole’s wealth of Geoffrey dollars, and who invented shoes? They take a quiz choosing pastries to see what ice cream flavor they are deep down (and learn what flavor Nicole hates), figure out how to make pudding, and answer listener questions on talking to a friend becoming a Jehovah’s Witness, friend breakups, and how to solve Sasheer’s hot dog problem. 

 

Here is the quiz we take: https://www.buzzfeed.com/naeun12/ice-cream-flavor-personality-quiz

 

Email or call Nicole & Sasheer with your friendship questions at:

nicoleandsasheer@gmail.com

424-645-7003
author: fanmail+bestfriends@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
